reviews.review_msg: Nice prof, but kind of boring. Some of the projects she comes up with are really weird and I didn't enjoy them at all. Overall, she is nice, but the classes are not that enjoyable.

If you're always working in studio, you'll get an A even if your project is conceptually lame.  A students get As, B students Bs.  Expects you to live and breathe school and thinks a 3 credit class is a full time job. Students shouldn't work outside of school or have half a life. Uses the same 5 thesaurus words repeatedly.  Pretentious, narrow mind

She is ABSOLUTELY the BEST teacher in the visual arts department, HANDS DOWN!!!  Some students are a little intimidated by her, but that's only because she is so enthusiastic and passionate about helping students grow - she's really on your side, and is a fountain of info, ideas, and encouragement.  A+++ teacher!!!
